headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Tutor Perini (TPC) After A 196% One-Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Tutor Perini shares still offer value after a big run, this article walks through what the current price might mean for potential investors. The stock last closed at US$75.09, with returns of 6.5% over 7 days, 13.7% over 30 days, 8.3% year to date and 195.9% over 1 year. The 3 year return is very large at roughly 7x, and the 5 year return also stands out. Recent coverage has focused on Tutor Perini as a major player in large construction and civil infrastructure...
